channel.title: APICheck - The DevSecOps toolset for REST APIs on Hugo Whisper Theme
channel.description: Recent content in APICheck - The DevSecOps toolset for REST APIs on Hugo Whisper Theme

item.title: APICheck Sensitive Data Finder
item.description: APICheck Sensitive Data Finder PYTHON 3.8 needed Usage through Kapow! > docker build -t ac-sd . > docker run -p 8080:8080 --rm -d ac-sd > curl --data-raw '{"password": "sss"}' -v http://localhost:8080/apicheck/sensitive-data [{"where": "response", "path": "/", "keyOrValue": "key", "sensitiveData": "password"}] Usage cli For the following examples data.

item.title: Replay
item.description: Replay Will send the traffic to the same place, in the same order, with the same params.

item.title: Send to proxy
item.description: Send to proxy This tool send stdin request to a remote proxy. Install Generic > ./INSTALL Python mode > python setup.py install Usage Getting help After install you can type this to use:
